name: Treasure Day
description:
Introducing Viker’s latest release: Treasure Day, the ultimate treasure hunting game!

Find hidden relics and treasures across hundreds of dig sites, to complete your gallery and become Viker’s #1 treasure hunter!

Dig through the dirt and smash through the rocks to reveal rare treasures!

Collect gems to unlock exclusive themes, reserved only for the most dedicated treasure hunters!

Lucky Chests give players the chance to win themes, gems and more keys - what will you win?

Turn on push notifications for exclusive features and updates!

FEATURES:
- Hundreds of dig sites to discover.
- Thousands of treasures to find.
- Collect bronze, silver, and gold relics, including super rare editions!
- Win exclusive themes, gems and keys in our Lucky Chests feature!
- Find 3 hidden keys to unlock the Lucky Chests.
Download NOW to complete the prestigious treasure hunter’s gallery - what are you waiting for?

Check out our social pages for news, updates, and more competitions:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/treasuredayapp/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vikerdaygames/

Treasure Day does not endorse or promote gambling. Treasure Day puzzles are intended solely for entertainment purposes.

Treasure Day does not require any details from it’s players to play.

*Apple is not a sponsor nor is it involved in any way with this app, nor do they endorse this service or sponsor us.

*Treasure Day is a mobile app that allows users to win with no purchase necessary.
